messages.subject: Samurai Fiction 2007 - more info
messages.msgSnippet: A little more info for the third annual Samurai Fiction contest - I am still working out the new rules, although there won t be a tremendous amount of
messages.messageBody:
A little more info for the third annual "Samurai Fiction" contest - I
am still working out the new rules, although there won't be a
tremendous amount of changes from last year.

One new development:

For every 5 entries, I will add $50 to the total winnings. So, the
more entries, the much higher the potential winnings. And don't
forget, the sooner you sign up, the less you will have to pay for the
entrance fee.

When I finish the website for the new contest, I'll post it here.
